allow: Bash(python -c "from notion_client import Client; c = Client\(auth=''test''\); print\(dir\(c.databases\)\)")
Bash(python -c "from notion_client import Client; c = Client\(auth=''test''\); print\([m for m in dir\(c\) if not m.startswith\(''_''\)]\)")
Bash(python -c "from notion_client import Client; c = Client\(auth=''test''\); print\(''pages:'', dir\(c.pages\)\); print\(''databases:'', dir\(c.databases\)\)")
